de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config
Class FSysConfig

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.interfaces.config.FSysConfig
public class FSysConfig
extends Object

This factory loads the configuration manager.

Version:
$Revision: 1.16 $
Author:
Torsten Knauft, Eugen Obermeier

Method Detail

createConfigManager

public static ISysConfigManager createConfigManager(Properties p)
                                             throws CSysConfigException
Creates an instance of ISysConfigManager. The specified properties object must contain a key as defined by ISysGlobal.CONFIG_CLASS

Parameters:
p - A properties object with the name of the class to be created.
Returns:
A new instance of the desired ISysConfigManager.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the name of the class cannot be found or the class cannot be created.

createConfig

public static ISysConfig createConfig(Properties p,
                                      String propsPrefix,
                                      String classSuffix)
                               throws CSysConfigException
Creates an instance of ISysConfig. The specified properties object must contain a key which starts the specified propsPrefix and ends with .class. If no class is specified a new instance of CSysSourcelessConfig is returned.

Parameters:
p - A properties object with the name of the class to be created.
propsPrefix - The class name is stored under the key with the form <propsPrefix><classSuffix>
classSuffix - Identifies the property which defines the class to load.
Returns:
A new instance of the desired ISysConfig.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the class cannot be created.

createConfig

                                      String propsPrefix)
                               throws CSysConfigException
classSuffix is usually .class

Parameters:
p - A properties object with the name of the class to be created.
propsPrefix - The class name is stored under the key with the form <propsPrefix><classSuffix>
Returns:
A new instance of the desired ISysConfig.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the class cannot be created.

createConfig

                               throws CSysConfigException
Creates an instance of CSysSourcelessConfig.

Returns:
A new instance of CSysSourcelessConfig.
Throws:
CSysConfigException - if the class cannot be created.
